    discovery

    discovery

    discovery.Rmd

    The {gt} Interactive Solution

    The linking is hard-coded into the table.

    admiraldiscovery::interactive_discovery("gt")

    The {reactable} Interactive Solution

    The linking is hard-coded into the table.

    admiraldiscovery::interactive_discovery("reactable")

    The knitr::kable() Static Solution

    Auto-linking works here.

    admiraldiscovery::discovery |> 
  head(n = 10) |> 
  dplyr::mutate(
    fn_linked = glue::glue("`{package}::{fn}()`"),
    .before = package
  ) |> 
  dplyr::select(-c("package", "fn", "fn_url")) |> 
  knitr::kable()
    dataset dataset_type variable variable_label fn_linked adam_ig_reference
    ADAE OCCDS ADURN Duration between two dates admiral::derive_vars_duration() NA
    ADAE OCCDS AEENDTC Analysis end time admiral::derive_vars_dtm() NA
    ADAE OCCDS AESTDTC Analysis start time admiral::derive_vars_dtm() NA
    ADAE OCCDS AOCCIFL Occurrence flags: first occurrence of most severe AE admiral::restrict_derivation() NA
    ADAE OCCDS LDOSEDTM Last dose date/time admiral::derive_vars_joined() NA
    ADAE OCCDS TRTEMFL Treatment emergent flag admiral::derive_var_trtemfl() NA
    ADCM OCCDS AOCCIFL 1st Occurrence of Preferred Term Flag admiral::restrict_derivation() NA
    ADCM OCCDS CMENDTC Analysis end time admiral::derive_vars_dtm() NA
    ADCM OCCDS CMSTDTC Analysis start time admiral::derive_vars_dtm() NA
    ADCM OCCDS ONTRTFL On-Treatment flag admiral::derive_var_ontrtfl() NA

    The {gt} Static Solution

    Auto-linking works here.

    library(gt)

admiraldiscovery::discovery |> 
  head(n = 10) |> 
  dplyr::mutate(
    fn_linked = glue::glue("`{package}::{fn}()`"),
    .before = package
  ) |> 
  dplyr::select(-c("package", "fn", "fn_url")) |> 
  gt::gt() |> 
  fmt_markdown()
